name: Cocktail Harmony
overview: Cocktail Harmony is the first cocktail simulation game and is a game about cocktails, the game have a complete database of cocktails glass, tools, words, materials, decorations, cocktails basics and recipes and also the 100 best cocktails. The game features more than 400 cocktail recipes!. The game features these game modes: Practice, My favorite, Contest (in which the player can compete againts another computer players in a tournament about build, stir, shake, blend and pousse, and will be jugde by a jury) and a story mode. The story mode tells the story of a young man that when is going to ask his girlfriend to marry him on the Christmas day, she rejects him and when he is going around the town he find Santa Claus that gives him a mobile phone. After that the game begins in december first of the enxt year and he can start calling different girls numbers that are on the phone and invite them to different cocktails places. To gain the affect of a girl is choosing between different answers to the questions that she ask you. Depending of the answers the cocktail bar and the love bar will increase or decrease. The player can also visit the cocktails bars and learn more about the different cocktails. This game mode features 6 different girls with different personalities and tastes.
